overview: It's 2020 and the world is changing before us. COVID-19 has completely changed everyone's way of life. To prevent COVID-19 from spreading; One city chief decides to take matters into his own hands and puts his entire city on a lockdown. This leaves one of his police detectives In the middle of an undercover operation, quarantined with a psychotic suspect. The detective must figure out how to make it through this quarantine relationship without her finding out. Will he make it out alive?
title: Quarantine Relationship
